title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Kraft Heinz to remove artificial dyes from all products, like Jell-O and Kool-Aid

items.title: Book Review: ‘Not My Type,’ by E. Jean Carroll
items.description: Her lawyers urged that she keep her testimony short. With legal victories in hand, she’s sharing her life story, and what it was like on the stand.

items.title: Brad Lander Is Arrested by ICE Agents at Immigration Courthouse

items.title: Alfred Brendel, Bravura Pianist Who Forged a Singular Path, Dies at 94
items.description: With little formal training but full of ideas, he focused on the core classical composers, winning over audiences (though not every critic) worldwide.

items.title: How Trump's travel ban could disrupt the way knowledge about health is shared
items.description: Global health specialists talk about the consequences of the full or partial ban on travel to the U.S. from 19 countries.

items.title: Bernie Sanders Endorses Zohran Mamdani for N.Y.C. Mayor
items.description: Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont backed Mr. Mamdani, joining Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez in endorsing the front-runner of progressives.

items.title: U.S. Revokes Visa of Former Panamanian President Who Criticized Trump Deal
items.description: Two politicians who spoke out against recent accords between the United States and Panama lost their permission to travel to the United States.

items.title: Is Abortion Legal in the UK? What to Know About the Law and Proposed Changes
